name: Perpetual Calendar
description:
The last template youâ€™ll need to build a weekly or monthly calendar. 


Make a few updates to the base day component and watch it update across your entire calendar. Update them to make it your own. 


Use variants to make adjustments to each month.


Build a month in just a few seconds.

Here's how quick it is:

  1. Grab a Title 
  2. Include a Description, maybe even include a task or two
  3. Pick which day starts the week for you (Sunday or Monday)
  4. Build your month and adjust the variant settings
  5. Done 


This template also makes use of the latest Interactive Components features.
